{{ product.name }} - {{ product.price }} {{ selectedCurrency }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-product', templateUrl: './product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product.component.css'] }) export class ProductComponent { products = [ { name: 'Product 1', price: 100 }, { name: 'Product 2', price: 200 }, { name: 'Product 3', price: 150 }, // Add more products as needed ]; currencies = [ { name: 'US Dollar', code: 'USD' }, { name: 'Euro', code: 'EUR' }, { name: 'Japanese Yen', code: 'JPY' }, // Add more currencies as needed ]; selectedCurrency: string = 'USD'; // Default currency onCurrencyChange(selectedCurrency: string) { this.selectedCurrency = selectedCurrency; // Make an HTTP request to your Web API controller with the selectedCurrency // You can use Angular's HttpClient for this purpose // Example: this.http.post('your-api-endpoint', { selectedCurrency }).subscribe(response => console.log(response)); } }
